name: Complex Harmonic Motion #1.3
description:
1024x1024 mp4; stereo audio; 30s seamless loop; started in 2006, this edition created in September 2021;
Memo Akten (memo.tv)

If the audio of the previous version (#1.2) was a bit too dark (this is what happens when I work at 4am), this one is a study that is perhaps a bit more mellow.

Part of a series of generative audio-visual pieces. Both the visuals and the audio are created with custom software (JavaScript, C++, and MaxMSP). Conceptually and technically an evolution of my "Simple Harmonic Motion" series (which started in 2011).
